attributes.action: Stop landlords discrimination against having pets
attributes.additional_details:
Well I’m this day and age. Majority of people own a pet of some kind and it is extremely difficult to find a rental property that excepts pets at all. 
Have you tried to rent anywhere owning a dog ???
It’s virtually impossible
attributes.background: I want the government to make a law that says landlords can no longer say NO PETS

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628512
